title: Spaghetti Bolognese
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a pan, sauté onions and garlic until soft.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Pour in tomato sauce and simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve sauce over spaghetti.
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with rich tomato and meat sauce.

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
steps: Wash and chop romaine lettuce.
Slice grilled chicken into strips.
Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Top with chicken, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.
Serve immediately.
description: A fresh, crunchy salad perfect for a quick lunch.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
steps: Heat sesame oil in a wok or large pan.
Add garlic and ginger, stir for 30 seconds.
Add mixed vegetables and stir fry for 5-7 minutes.
Drizzle with soy sauce and cook for another minute.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.
description: A quick and healthy stir fry with fresh vegetables.

title: Pancakes
steps: In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, and baking powder.
Add milk and egg, whisk until smooth.
Heat a lightly oiled griddle or pan over medium heat.
Pour 1/4 cup of batter for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles form, flip and cook until golden.
description: Fluffy and delicious pancakes, perfect for breakfast.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
steps: Butter one side of each bread slice.
Place cheese slices between the unbuttered sides of the bread.
Heat a pan over medium heat.
Cook sandwich on each side until golden brown.
Slice and serve warm.
description: A gooey, cheesy sandwich that’s quick and satisfying.

title: Beef Tacos
steps: Cook ground beef in a skillet until browned.
Fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
Serve immediately.
description: Mexican-inspired tacos with seasoned beef and fresh toppings.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Cream butter and sugars together.
Add egg and mix well.
Stir in flour and chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet.
Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 10-12 minutes.
description: Classic cookies with gooey chocolate chips.

title: Vegetable Soup
steps: In a pot, sauté carrots, celery, and potatoes.
Add vegetable broth and bring to a boil.
Add tomatoes and simmer for 20-25 minutes.
Serve hot.
description: A hearty and healthy soup for a light lunch.

title: Egg Fried Rice
steps: Heat oil in a pan and scramble the eggs.
Add vegetables and cook for 3-5 minutes.
Mix in the cooked rice and soy sauce.
Stir fry for 2-3 minutes and serve.
description: Quick and simple fried rice with eggs and veggies.

title: BBQ Chicken Wings
steps: Season chicken wings with salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
Bake in a preheated oven at 375°F (190°C) for 25 minutes.
Brush with BBQ sauce and honey, then bake for another 10 minutes.
Serve hot.
description: Sticky and flavorful chicken wings perfect for dinner.

title: Greek Salad
steps: Combine cucumber, tomatoes, feta cheese, and olives in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and toss to mix.
Serve chilled.
description: A refreshing Mediterranean salad with classic ingredients.

title: French Toast
steps: Whisk eggs, milk, and vanilla in a bowl.
Dip bread slices into the mixture.
Cook on a buttered pan over medium heat until golden brown.
Serve with syrup or powdered sugar.
description: A sweet and comforting breakfast classic.

title: Classic Burger
steps: Shape ground beef into two patties and season with salt and pepper.
Cook patties on a grill or pan for 4-5 minutes on each side.
Assemble burgers with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and condiments.
description: A hearty and satisfying burger with all the essentials.

title: Margherita Pizza
steps: Roll out pizza dough and spread tomato sauce over it.
Sprinkle mozzarella cheese and place basil leaves on top.
Bake in a preheated oven at 475°F (245°C) for 10-12 minutes.
Drizzle with olive oil and serve.
description: A simple and authentic Italian pizza with fresh ingredients.

title: Banana Smoothie
steps: Blend all ingredients in a blender until smooth.
Pour into a glass and serve immediately.
description: A creamy and delicious smoothie to start your day.

title: Tomato Basil Soup
steps: Sauté onion and garlic in a pot until soft.
Add tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes.
Pour in vegetable broth and simmer for 20 minutes.
Blend the soup until smooth and garnish with basil.
description: A comforting and rich tomato soup with fresh basil.

title: Shrimp Scampi
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a pan, melt butter and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook until pink, about 2-3 minutes per side.
Stir in lemon juice and toss with spaghetti.
Serve immediately, garnished with parsley if desired.
description: A rich and flavorful shrimp dish served with spaghetti.

title: Quinoa Salad
steps: Cook quinoa according to package instructions and let cool.
Combine quinoa, cucumber, tomatoes, and feta cheese in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and toss to combine.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.
description: A light and nutritious salad with fresh ingredients.

title: Chicken Curry
steps: Sauté onion and garlic in a pan until soft.
Add chicken and cook until no longer pink.
Stir in curry powder and coconut milk.
Simmer for 20 minutes and serve with rice.
description: A creamy and aromatic curry perfect for dinner.

title: Avocado Toast
steps: Toast the bread slice until golden.
Spread mashed avocado over the toast.
Season with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
Serve immediately.
description: A simple and healthy breakfast option.

title: Fish Tacos
steps: Cook fish fillets in a pan until flaky.
Assemble tacos with fish, cabbage, and sour cream.
Serve with lime wedges on the side.
description: Fresh and zesty tacos with tender fish fillets.

title: Chocolate Mousse
steps: Melt chocolate in a heatproof bowl over simmering water.
Whip cream with sugar until soft peaks form.
Stir egg yolks and vanilla into melted chocolate.
Fold whipped cream into the chocolate mixture.
Chill for at least 2 hours before serving.
description: A rich and creamy chocolate dessert.

title: Caprese Salad
steps: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices alternately on a plate.
Add basil leaves between the slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.
Serve immediately.
description: A classic Italian salad with simple and fresh ingredients.

title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix ground beef, rice, and tomato sauce in a bowl.
Stuff the mixture into bell pepper halves.
Top with shredded cheese and bake for 30 minutes.
description: Bell peppers stuffed with a hearty beef and rice filling.
